definition: to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]

sentences.english: Key work in understanding the problems of using animal blood for human transfusions was provided by Ponfick and Landois.
sentences.chinese: 頗費克和蘭德思發現了給人輸注動物血的關鍵問題。

sentences.english: Objective Understanding ingredient blood of feeding in unite rescuing traffic incidents curative effect observing.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解成分血聯合輸注搶救交通傷的療效觀察。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the therapeutic effects of platelet transfusion in acute leukemic patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討急性白血病患者反覆輸注血小板的治療效果。

sentences.english: There was no depression of uterine activity during infusion period and second stage of labor.
sentences.chinese: 此後在連續輸注及第二產程中無宮縮抑制現象。

sentences.english: Objective To study the neuroprotective effect on rats with cold saline infusion intra-arterially.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大鼠動脈內少量冷鹽水輸注的神經保護作用。

sentences.english: Objective:To compare the effect of labor induced with intravenous infusion of high and low dose of oxytocin in late gestation.
sentences.chinese: 比較大小劑量縮宮素靜脈輸注對晚期妊娠引產的效果。

sentences.english: The patients in the control group were intravenously administered compound sodium lactate.
sentences.chinese: 對照組麻醉後常規輸注複方乳酸鈉。

sentences.english: To study the cryoprecipitate infusion in the treatment of patients with massive blood loss efficacy.
sentences.chinese: 探討冷沉澱輸注在大量失血患者治療中的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of ultraviolet blood irradiation therapy (UBIT) on the efficiency of platelet transfusions.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討血液光量子療法對血小板輸注效果的影響。

sentences.english: Plasmapheresis prior to plasma infusion in TTP treatment.
sentences.chinese: 血漿置換治療明顯優於血漿輸注。

sentences.english: This usually occurs after a large dose of regular insulin.
sentences.chinese: 這通常是由於大劑量的輸注短效胰島素引起的。

sentences.english: Manufacturer states that infusion time does not affect blood kalium and natrium levels in the body .
sentences.chinese: 出廠標明輸注時間不影響身體血液的鉀鈉水平。

sentences.english: The researchers gave the drug by intravenous infusions for three consecutive days every three weeks.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員每三週連續三天靜脈輸注此藥。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the application of indwelling needle in transfusing mannitol in vein.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討靜脈留置針在靜脈輸注甘露醇中的應用。

sentences.english: We already are able to infuse insulin semi-automatically.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經能夠半自動地輸注胰島素。

sentences.english: Conclusion UBIO can reduce refractoriness to platelet transfusion.
sentences.chinese: 結論血液光量子療法可減少血小板輸注無效。
